text: Orly Levy-Abekasis (, born 11 November 1973) is an Israeli politician. She is a member of the Knesset for Gesher. In 2019, she formed her own party, Gesher, while running in the April 2019 elections. Although the party failed to win a seat, she returned to the Knesset following the September 2019 elections, in which Gesher ran together with the Labor Party. ==References== Category:1973 births Category:Living people Category:Israeli politicians Category:Israeli models Category:Israeli Jews Category:Israeli television presenters Category:Likud politicians Category:Yisrael Beiteinu politicians
title: Orly Levy-Abekasis
